channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will Commercial Samples Ship Duty Free Anymore After De Minimis Changes? It’s Complicated
item.description: For the most part, commercial samples have entered the U.S. duty-free. Will that continue?

item.title: 5 Tips to Keep a Performance Review From Becoming a Lawsuit
item.description: Consistency is critical, even when problems at work are extreme.

item.title: I’m the president of a $1 billion software unicorn and I’ve seen the ‘Gen Z stare’ disappear in healthy workplaces. It’s a wake-up call for hospitality
item.description: That so-called stare isn’t a withdrawal; it’s a mirror.

item.title: Investing in Manager Training Might Just Be the Secret to Startup Growth
item.description: A little bit of strategic investment in manager training can yield large returns.

item.title: China’s economic data is famously unreliable—and could be a warning if Trump meddles with the Bureau of Labor Statistics
item.description: Beijing “is really intolerant of economic instability, and so everything gets smoothed,” Derek Scissors of the American Enterprise Institute says.

item.title: Lowe’s is acquiring Foundation Building Materials in a deal worth nearly $8.8 billion

item.title: This Women’s Hygiene Brand Is Proof That a Rebrand Can Be Fuel for Growth
item.description: When your brand name no longer matches your ambition, the brave move is to evolve.

item.title: In Minnesota, ‘dairy princesses’ take home a 90-pound butter bust of their own heads
item.description: They can deep-freeze their heads as souvenirs or share them with family and friends.

item.title: Trump declares war on clean energy. The numbers show it’s the only thing keeping America’s lights affordable
item.description: The “scam of the century,” according to Trump, is the only thing keeping bills from soaring.

item.title: Supreme Court sides with Trump’s anti-DEI efforts to cut $783 million in research funding

item.title: Philadelphia’s famously spooky Mutter Museum redraws policies around displaying its 6,500 human remains
item.description: The museum's new human remains policy says that many were “obtained in unacceptable circumstances including through force or duress."

item.title: The Problem With Learning From Podcasts, According to Neuroscience
item.description: Scientists warn that we lose something important when we shift from learning from books to learning from podcasts and videos.
